On our math theme, let's go to Steve(ph) in Portland, Oregon.
You got a math joke for us?
I've got a math joke here.
A mathematician is smoking while he's working at his desk and casually sets his cigarette on the edge of his ashtray.
It falls off the edge of the ashtray and he set - and sets fire to the papers on his desk.
He runs over to the fire extinguisher hanging on the wall near the door, grabs it and puts out the fire.
The next day, he's again smoking while he's working.
And this time, he casually tosses the cigarette into the wastebasket next to his desk.
And when he finally notices it, he jumps up and pours the flaming contents of a wastebasket onto his desk.
And then he goes back work because he's already solved that problem.
Steve, where did you hear that one?
I can't remember where I heard it.
